div.head: 小便遺床
div.div: minor relief with loss [of urine] in one‘s bed; bedwetting

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief with loss [of urine] in one‘s bed; bedwetting

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with niao chuang 尿床 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ma xie 麻鞋 quotes Jin xiao fang 近效方 : 小便 遺床：麻鞋尖頭二七枚，燒灰，歲朝井華水服之 , “For bedwetting : burn 27 tips of hemp shoes to ashes and consume them with early morning well water drawn on the first day of the New Year”.
